articles.title: Alphabet won’t talk about the Google-Apple AI deal, even to investors - TechCrunch
articles.description: Alphabet CEO skipped an analyst's question about Apple on the company's earnings call.
articles.content: Alphabet declined to answer one of its investors during questions about Google’s AI deal with Apple on Wednesday’s fourth-quarter earnings call. Instead of responding to an analyst’s question about h… [+2288 chars]
